verses.verse: Now this <S%H2088><s%> is the blessing <S%H1293><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> his death. <S%H4194><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> And dawned <S%H2224><s%> on them from Seir; <S%H8165><s%> He shone <S%H3313><s%> forth <S%H3313><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Paran, <S%H6290><s%> And He came <S%H857><s%> from the midst of ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H7233><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> ones; <S%H6944><s%> At His right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> there was flashing <S%H799><s%> lightning <S%H799><s%> for them.

"Indeed, <S%H637><s%> He loves <S%H2245><s%> the people; <S%H5971><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> Thy holy <S%H6918><s%> ones <S%H6918><s%> are in Thy hand, <S%H3027><s%> And they followed <S%H8497><s%> in Thy steps; <S%H7272><s%> [Everyone] receives <S%H5375><s%> of Thy words. <S%H1703><s%>
"Moses <S%H4872><s%> charged <S%H6680><s%> us with a law, <S%H8451><s%> A possession <S%H4181><s%> for the assembly <S%H6952><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

"And He was king <S%H4428><s%> in Jeshurun, <S%H3484><s%> When the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> were gathered, <S%H622><s%> The tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
"May Reuben <S%H7205><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> and not die, <S%H4191><s%> Nor <S%H408><s%> his men <S%H4962><s%> be few. <S%H4557><s%>"

And this <S%H2088><s%> regarding Judah; <S%H3063><s%> so he said, <S%H559><s%> "Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> And bring <S%H935><s%> him to his people. <S%H5971><s%> With his hands <S%H3027><s%> he contended <S%H7378><s%> for them; And mayest Thou be a help <S%H5828><s%> against <S%H4480><s%> his adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>"

And of Levi <S%H3878><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "[Let] Thy Thummim <S%H8550><s%> and Thy Urim <S%H224><s%> [belong] to Thy godly <S%H2623><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> Whom <S%H834><s%> Thou didst prove <S%H5254><s%> at Massah, <S%H4532><s%> With whom Thou didst contend <S%H7378><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah; <S%H4809><s%>

Who said <S%H559><s%> of his father and his mother, <S%H1><s%> 'I did not consider <S%H517><s%> them'; And he did not acknowledge <S%H7200><s%> his brothers, <S%H5234><s%> Nor <S%H251><s%> did he regard <S%H3808><s%> his own sons, <S%H3045><s%> For they observed <S%H1121><s%> Thy word, <S%H8104><s%> And kept <S%H565><s%> Thy covenant. <S%H5341><s%>

"They shall teach <S%H3384><s%> Thine ordinances <S%H4941><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> And Thy law <S%H8451><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%> They shall put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H6988><s%> before <S%H639><s%> Thee, And whole <S%H3632><s%> burnt <S%H3632><s%> offerings <S%H3632><s%> on Thine altar. <S%H4196><s%>

"O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> his substance, <S%H2428><s%> And accept <S%H7521><s%> the work <S%H6467><s%> of his hands; <S%H3027><s%> Shatter <S%H4272><s%> the loins <S%H4975><s%> of those who rise <S%H6965><s%> up against him, And those who hate <S%H8130><s%> him, so <S%H4480><s%> that they may not rise <S%H6965><s%> [again.]"

Of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "May the beloved <S%H3039><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in security <S%H983><s%> by Him, Who shields <S%H2653><s%> him all <S%H3605><s%> the day, <S%H3117><s%> And he dwells <S%H7931><s%> between <S%H996><s%> His shoulders. <S%H3802><s%>"

And of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> [be] his land, <S%H776><s%> With the choice <S%H4022><s%> things <S%H4022><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> with the dew, <S%H2919><s%> And from the deep <S%H8415><s%> lying <S%H7257><s%> beneath, <S%H8478><s%>
And with the choice <S%H4022><s%> yield <S%H8393><s%> of the sun, <S%H8121><s%> And with the choice <S%H4022><s%> produce <S%H1645><s%> of the months. <S%H3391><s%>

"And with the best <S%H7218><s%> things <S%H7218><s%> of the ancient <S%H6924><s%> mountains, <S%H2022><s%> And with the choice <S%H4022><s%> things <S%H4022><s%> of the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> hills, <S%H1389><s%>

And with the choice <S%H4022><s%> things <S%H4022><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> and its fulness, <S%H4393><s%> And the favor <S%H7522><s%> of Him who dwelt <S%H7931><s%> in the bush. <S%H5572><s%> Let it come <S%H935><s%> to the head <S%H7218><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> And to the crown <S%H6936><s%> of the head <S%H6936><s%> of the one <S%H5139><s%> distinguished <S%H5139><s%> among his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

"As the first-born of his ox, <S%H7794><s%> majesty <S%H1926><s%> is his, And his horns <S%H7161><s%> are the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wild <S%H7214><s%> ox; <S%H7214><s%> With them he shall push <S%H5055><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> All <S%H9191><s%> at once, <S%H9191><s%> [to] the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> And those <S%H1992><s%> are the ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H7233><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> And those <S%H1992><s%> are the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>"

And of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> in your going <S%H3318><s%> forth, <S%H3318><s%> And, Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> in your tents. <S%H168><s%>

"They shall call <S%H7121><s%> peoples <S%H5971><s%> [to] the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> There <S%H8033><s%> they shall offer <S%H2076><s%> righteous <S%H6664><s%> sacrifices; <S%H2077><s%> For they shall draw <S%H3243><s%> out the abundance <S%H8228><s%> of the seas, <S%H3220><s%> And the hidden <S%H2934><s%> treasures <S%H5603><s%> of the sand. <S%H2344><s%>"

And of Gad <S%H1410><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> is the one who enlarges <S%H7337><s%> Gad; <S%H1410><s%> He lies <S%H7931><s%> down <S%H7931><s%> as a lion, <S%H3833><s%> And tears <S%H2963><s%> the arm, <S%H2220><s%> also <S%H637><s%> the crown <S%H6936><s%> of the head. <S%H6936><s%>

"Then he provided <S%H7200><s%> the first <S%H7225><s%> [part] for himself, For there <S%H8033><s%> the ruler's portion <S%H2513><s%> was reserved; <S%H5603><s%> And he came <S%H857><s%> [with] the leaders <S%H7218><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%> He executed <S%H6213><s%> the justice <S%H6666><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And His ordinances <S%H4941><s%> with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
And of Dan <S%H1835><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "Dan <S%H1835><s%> is a lion's whelp, <S%H1482><s%> That leaps <S%H2187><s%> forth from Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>"

And of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "O Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> satisfied <S%H7649><s%> with favor, <S%H7522><s%> And full <S%H4392><s%> of the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> and the south. <S%H1864><s%>"

And of Asher <S%H836><s%> he said, <S%H559><s%> "More <S%H4480><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> is Asher; <S%H836><s%> May he be favored <S%H7521><s%> by his brothers, <S%H251><s%> And may he dip <S%H2881><s%> his foot <S%H7272><s%> in oil. <S%H8081><s%>
"Your locks <S%H4515><s%> shall be iron <S%H1270><s%> and bronze, <S%H5178><s%> And according to your days, <S%H3117><s%> so shall your leisurely <S%H1679><s%> walk <S%H1679><s%> be.

"There <S%H369><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> like the God <S%H410><s%> of Jeshurun, <S%H3484><s%> Who rides <S%H7392><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> to your help, <S%H5828><s%> And through the skies <S%H7834><s%> in His majesty. <S%H1346><s%>

"The eternal <S%H6924><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is a dwelling <S%H4585><s%> place, <S%H4585><s%> And underneath <S%H8478><s%> are the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> arms; <S%H2220><s%> And He drove <S%H1644><s%> out the enemy <S%H340><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, And said, <S%H559><s%> 'Destroy! <S%H8045><s%>'

"So Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwells <S%H7931><s%> in security, <S%H983><s%> The fountain <S%H9407><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> secluded, <S%H910><s%> In a land <S%H776><s%> of grain <S%H1715><s%> and new <S%H8492><s%> wine; <S%H8492><s%> His heavens <S%H8064><s%> also <S%H637><s%> drop <S%H6201><s%> down <S%H6201><s%> dew. <S%H2919><s%>

"Blessed <S%H835><s%> are you, O Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> you, a people <S%H5971><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> by the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who is the shield <S%H4043><s%> of your help, <S%H5828><s%> And the sword <S%H2719><s%> of your majesty! <S%H1346><s%> So your enemies <S%H340><s%> shall cringe <S%H3584><s%> before you, And you shall tread <S%H1869><s%> upon their high <S%H1116><s%> places. <S%H1116><s%>"
